quotes.quote: The here and now is all we have, and if we play it right it's all we'll need.
quotes.author: Ann Richards

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Collin Powell

quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I have lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.' You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Do the best you can in every task, no matter how unimportant it may seem at the time. No one learns more about a problem than the person at the bottom.
quotes.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy
quotes.author: Dalai Lama
